name: The Beer Money App
description: An app to help users save money on outings and day-to-day expenses through geo-location-based coupons and savings. The app tracked user savings and partnered with local businesses to offer specials.

name: GridLock
description: An API platform that enables customers to monitor and control traffic lights and track traffic in real-time, optimizing traffic light schedules with machine learning algorithms to reduce emissions and congestion.

name: Liza
description: A gamification app designed to promote water conservation during drought conditions in Texas, using smart water meters and a mobile interface.

name: Vert
description: A gamification app encouraging recycling by using BLE-based smart trashcan sensors to reward participants for their conservation efforts.
